rows.label: tlk004101_04_msg0001
rows.name:
In Temperantia, the political buffer
zone between Superbia and Invidia...
acts of war must not occur.

rows.label: tlk004101_04_msg0002
rows.name:
However, it may be that Superbia
was waiting for this very moment.

rows.label: tlk004101_04_msg0003
rows.name:
...His Holiness has entrusted
this to you, but there is always
the chance of the unforeseen.

rows.label: tlk004101_04_msg0004
rows.name:
We, too, must proceed
with preparations...
